name: GastHaus Bremer Backpacker Hostel

reviews.title: New and clean, but with water inconveniences
reviews.text: Stayed two nights in April 2004 in a single room. It's a clean, friendly, and above all cheap place to stay and for that I'd recommend it. But I don't know if I'd want to stay more than a day or two because of access to water! It sounds funny, but there are very few sinks in the place. I stayed on the 3rd floor and the nearest sink was on the 1st floor. That sink had only a trickle of cold water. There was only one sink with hot water, in the shower room on the ground floor. There were very few people there in April but in summer I could imagine queues for the sink. But hey, if you bring your own drinking water, forget about shaving, and don't mind walking up and down a couple of flights of stairs to brush your teeth or take a shower, it's a nice place otherwise, and I think more people should visit Bremen. It's a really nice little city.

description: The GastHaus is a backpacker hostel and our main customers are people who like to share dormitory rooms for reasonable prices and contact with other travellers. We have a clean and well equipped kitchen which all guests can use. The showers are on most floors, private and communal (male and female separate). We have a large comfortable lounge with TV and internet access.Ideally situated in the center of Bremen, this young and old city. A friendly, clean, safe and quiet house in a small side street. Your sightseeing, shopping and the lively evening entertainment are all within walking distance.
